Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.elements.input

Class ButtonGuiElement

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.GuiElement<Style,ElementType>
technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.elements.input.BaseInputGuiElement<BaseStyles,ButtonGuiElement>
technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.elements.input.ButtonGuiElement
public class ButtonGuiElement extends BaseInputGuiElement<BaseStyles,ButtonGuiElement>
ButtonGuiElement is a BaseInputGuiElement that allows users to interact via clicking the button or using keyboard shortcuts.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ButtonGuiElement()
    Creates a ButtonGuiElement and adds default event listeners for handling disabled states and when the Key.SPACE key is pressed.
